name: Ajax Continuations Talk
body:
### Projects Used
* jquery.continuations: http://darthfubumvc.github.com/jquery-continuations/
* FubuMVC: http://nuget.org/Packages/FubuMVC
* FubuValidation: http://nuget.org/Packages/FubuValidation
* FubuMVC.Validation: http://nuget.org/Packages/FubuMVC.Validation
* jquery.diagnostics: http://jmarnold.github.com/jquery.diagnostics

### Further reading
* http://lostechies.com/josharnold/tag/jquery-continuations
tagline: Companion repository for my Ajax Continuations talk
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
